entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New SpaProxyManager requires port to be hit before starting dev server #37661
  • Root-level virtualization incompatible with overflow-y:scroll on html/body elements #37659
  • running AOT on a Blazor WASM app Error on .net Standard 2.0 dll #37658
  • Improve error handling in template tests #37656
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [blazor] [wasm] Unable to debug after redirect to oidc #37655
  • Add documentation for E2E Tests #37654
  • Targeting pack PlatformManifest.txt built by source-build has differences vs. official build #37651
  • Consider supporting IJSInProcessRuntime in Blazor Desktop #37647
  • Blazor + TailwindCss template #37644
    Backlog
  • Reapplying hot reload deltas on load can cause browser hang #37642
    6.0.0
  • Selecting ,Dragging and dropping text in the SummorNote throws 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore')' Exception #37638
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37636
  • Error boundary not rendering error section when throws happens within the component #37634

Closed

  • Consider adding @suppressDirective #6362
    Backlog
  • Cache RazorSourceDocument SyntaxTree when Open #24030
    Backlog
  • Localization not working with Private Use Subtags #30345
    Backlog
  • Issue in Data Annotations Localization factory #12412
    Backlog
  • ResourceType on DataAnnotationAttribute should be honored when using a DataAnnotationLocalizerProvider #19617
    Backlog
  • IViewLocalizer and IHtmlLocalizer not working as expected when used with RazorPage in a RazorClassLibrary #20673
    Backlog
  • Blazor pseudoelements when using a preprocessor #26044
    Backlog
  • Blazor: Style encapsulation does not work without a base element #37262
    Backlog
  • get access to CSS Isolation identifier #25683
    Backlog
  • Css isolation not working with Razor runtime compilation #33446
    Backlog
  • Tracking: Add support for TagsMetadata in endpoints #37543
    6.0.0
  • Add getting started docs for minimal routing and RequestDelegateFactory #31991
    6.0.0
  • Creating a ASP.NET Core Web App project with "dotnet" at the end of its name results in error 500.0 when debugging with IIS Express. #35998
    6.0.0
  • Cannot build razor view in VS2019 after installing VS2022 with errors about #line directives #37660
  • .NET 6 gRPC project templates use gRPC.Tools NuGet package which does not work on Big Sur #37060
    6.0.0
  • Templates.Test.GrpcTemplateTest.GrpcTemplate #37457
    Next sprint planning
  • DefaultTokenProviders don't work when having more than 2 user accounts #37555
    Discussions
  • Incorrect primary output path for Blazor Web Assembly project template #36463
    7.0-preview1
  • Flaky Test: "CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile" #27858
    Next sprint planning
  • CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink CheckOversizedStdErrWrites #27178
    Next sprint planning
  • Test failure CheckFrebDisconnect #29428
    Next sprint planning
  • Tag Helper enum attribute produces false IntelliCode CS0103 in a razor page in Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3.1 #36937
    6.0.0
  • Blazor PointerEventArgs.Button always -1 with svg #37213
  • Publish Blazor WebAssembly application and try to lazy load Razor Library assembly, met "Could not resolve type with token 01000014 from typeref balabala" error; #37586
  • Status code does not indicate success: 401 (Unauthorized) #37635
  • Asp.Net Core 5.0 and Angular 12 sockjs-node error #37584
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #37624

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version in templates (#37621) #37664
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions #37663
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Enable targeting pack build during source-build #37652
  • Avoid null args when RazorDiagnostic does not have a message #37650
    Servicing-consider
  • Avoid null args when RazorDiagnostic does not have a message #37648
    area-razor.compiler
  • [release/6.0] Switch to stable RTM branding #37643
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `075810f` to `16f637f` #37640
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix playwright tests on helix matrix #37518
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Cherry-pick #37414 to [release/6.0] for #37340 #37417
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version in templates #37621
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [AzureB2C] Fix missing sign in button #37601
    area-mvc
  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37567
    area-mvc
  • Enable helix retry for a small set of tests #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • [Backport][Blazor] JS root component registration #37598
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Fix virtualization horizontal scrolling #37585
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37542
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Support setting ApiParameterRouetInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix templates with Windows auth option #37607
    area-mvc
  • 34411 HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Response trailers collection not reset #37627
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix CertificateManagerEventSource events 16 and 30 #37625
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Mechanism for providing validation CSS class names through DI #34777
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix IHost being disposed of twice #37631
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
